Package org.eclipse.jetty.util

Class AtomicBiInteger

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Number
      • java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong
        • org.eclipse.jetty.util.AtomicBiInteger

  • public class AtomicBiInteger
extends java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong
    An AtomicLong with additional methods to treat it has two hi/lo integers.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • compareAndSetHi

        public boolean compareAndSetHi​(int expect,
                               int hi)
        Atomically sets the hi int value to the given updated value only if the current value == the expected value. Concurrent changes to the lo value result in a retry.
        Parameters:
        expect - the expected value
        hi - the new value
        Returns:
        true if successful. False return indicates that the actual value was not equal to the expected value.

      • compareAndSetLo

        public boolean compareAndSetLo​(int expect,
                               int lo)
        Atomically sets the lo int value to the given updated value only if the current value == the expected value. Concurrent changes to the hi value result in a retry.
        Parameters:
        expect - the expected value
        lo - the new value
        Returns:
        true if successful. False return indicates that the actual value was not equal to the expected value.

      • compareAndSet

        public boolean compareAndSet​(long expect,
                             int hi,
                             int lo)
        Atomically sets the values to the given updated values only if the current encoded value == the expected value.
        Parameters:
        expect - the expected encoded values
        hi - the new hi value
        lo - the new lo value
        Returns:
        true if successful. False return indicates that the actual value was not equal to the expected value.

      • compareAndSet

        public boolean compareAndSet​(int expectHi,
                             int hi,
                             int expectLo,
                             int lo)
        Atomically sets the values to the given updated values only if the current encoded value == the expected value.
        Parameters:
        expectHi - the expected hi values
        hi - the new hi value
        expectLo - the expected lo values
        lo - the new lo value
        Returns:
        true if successful. False return indicates that the actual value was not equal to the expected value.

        the updated value

        Parameters:

        deltaLo - the delta to apply to the lo value
